attributes.action: Britain must accept Ukrainian war refugees
attributes.additional_details: It is about time , the situation will only get worse. Act now
attributes.background: British people are willing to help refugees from war torn areas. Why does the government stand in the way of what is the right and humane course of action. It is a disgrace that we as a democratic wealthy country do not step up and take some of the responsibility for these people.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Help Ukrainian refugees and create a safe path for them to get to the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609574

Grant Ukrainian citizens fleeing the war full rights to live and work in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609434

Implement arrangements to enable English households to sponsor Ukraine refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610542

Create a system to house Ukrainian families with children in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609714

Draw up and implement a specific Ukrainian refugee strategy for the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609431

Since you started your petition the Government has launched the Homes for Ukraine scheme, which will allow individuals, charities, community groups and businesses in the UK to bring Ukrainians to safety – including those with no family ties to the UK. You can find out more about this scheme here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/homes-for-ukraine-scheme-launches
